content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 (9 inch) deep dish pie crust" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "400 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "205 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:_result ( preheated-oven / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Beat the eggs in a large bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the eggs"@8:16 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@20:32 / TOOL )
		:_result ( beaten-eggs )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Mix in sugar, salt, vanilla, and syrup.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@10:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "salt"@17:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla"@23:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "syrup"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:gol ( beaten-eggs / FOOD )
		:_result ( syrup-egg-mixture / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Melt the butter or margarine, and add it to the egg mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "or"@-1:-1 / CHOICE )
		:option ( ing-6 "the butter"@8:18 / FOOD )
		:option ( "margarine"@22:31 / FOOD )
		:_result ( melted-butter )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "add"@37:40 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "it"@41:43 / PRONOUN )
		:gol ( syrup-egg-mixture "the egg mixture"@47:62 / FOOD )
		:_result ( butter-egg-mixture )
	)
)

( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the nuts"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:gol ( butter-egg-mixture / FOOD )
		:_result ( nuts-filling / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( nuts-filling "filling"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-7 "pie shell"@21:30 / FOOD )
		:_result ( uncooked-pie / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( preheated-oven "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "10 minutes"@30:40 / DUR )
		:ppt ( uncooked-pie / FOOD )
		:_result ( baked-pie )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C), and continue baking for 35 to 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Reduce"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@10:14 / OTHER )
		:gol ( temp-7-0 "300 degrees F"@18:31 / TEMPERATURE )
		:gol ( temp-7-1 "150 degrees C"@33:46 / TEMPERATURE )
		:_result ( reduced-heat )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "baking"@62:68 / AC
		:ppt ( baked-pie / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "35 to 45 minutes"@73:89 / DUR )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
